summary.span: 表示一系列連接的直線和曲線。

span.span: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式會使用路徑來繪製圖形外，填滿的圖案，內部建立裁剪區域。Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions. 圖形引擎會維護全局座標空間在路徑中的幾何形狀的座標。The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space. 路徑可能會包含任何數目的數字 （路徑）。A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths). 每一個圖形可能是由一系列連接的直線和曲線或基本幾何形狀組成。Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive. 圖形的起點是序列中連接的直線和曲線的第一個點。The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves. 結束點則是序列中的最後一個點。The ending point is the last point in the sequence. 基本規格所定義的開始和結束點的基本幾何形狀。The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification. 數字組成的一系列連接的直線和曲線 （其開始和結束點可能同一） 是開放的圖表，除非它已明確地關閉。A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly. 圖可以明確地關閉使用方法，它會關閉目前的圖形從結束點的線條連接的起始點。A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point. 包含幾何形狀基本類型圖是封閉的圖表。A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure. 基於填滿和裁剪的 (例如，如果使用轉譯路徑)，為所有開啟數據都將從圖中的第一個點的一行加入至最後一個點，已關閉。For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using ), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point. 建立路徑時，或已關閉圖時，會隱含地開始新的圖形。A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed. 新的圖時，會明確地建立方法呼叫。A new figure is explicitly created when the method is called. 當幾何圖形原始物件加入至路徑時，它會將包含幾何形狀圖，並也隱含地開始新的圖形。When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure. 因此，一定會有目前的圖形路徑中。Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path. 當直線和曲線加入至路徑時，隱含的線條會加入視連線目前圖形的結束點的新線條和曲線來形成一系列連接的直線和曲線開始點。When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves. 圖中有描述如何將直線和曲線線段追蹤之間的起點和終點的方向。A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point. 方向是直線和曲線加入至圖形，或基本幾何形狀所定義的順序定義。The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive. 方向會用來決定裁剪和填滿的路徑內部。The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.

summary.span: 將橢圓弧形附加到目前的圖形。

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddArc (System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, float startAngle, float sweepAngle);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddArc(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, float32 startAngle, float32 sweepAngle) cil managed
Public Sub AddArc (rect As Rectangle, startAngle As Single, sweepAngle As Single)
public: void AddArc(System::Drawing::Rectangle rect, float startAngle, float sweepAngle);

param.name: rect
param.span: ，表示用來取得弧形之橢圓形的矩形界限。

span.span: A that represents the rectangular bounds of the ellipse from which the arc is taken.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 弧形的開始點角度，順時針自 X 軸所測得的度數。

span.span: The starting angle of the arc, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis.

param.name: sweepAngle
param.span: 介於弧形的 startAngle 和結束點的角度。

span.span: The angle between startAngle and the end of the arc.

summary.span: 將橢圓弧形附加到目前的圖形。

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，一行加入上一個區段端點連接至弧線的開頭。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc. 弧線被沿著指定之矩形所限定的橢圓形的周邊。The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle. 開始角度的度數數目 （在 0 度角） 橢圓形的 x 軸順時針測量取決於弧形的起點。The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle. 端點同樣位於藉由從起點朝順時針方向測量的掃掠角度的度數。The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle. 如果掃掠角度大於 360 度或小於-360 度，則分別由 360 度或-360 度清理弧線。If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立的矩形，定義弧形。Creates a rectangle, from which the arc is defined. - 建立路徑， `myPath`。Creates a path, `myPath`. - 定義 180 度的橢圓形弧線，從 0 度跨越到 180 度，並將它附加至的路徑。Defines a 180-degree elliptical arc that sweeps from 0 degrees to 180 degrees and appends it to a path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將立方貝茲曲線加入至目前圖形。

span.span: Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用第二個和第三個點做為控制點三次方曲線是從第一個點建構至第四個點。The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points. 如果沒有上一個線條或曲線線段圖中的，新增的一行上一個區段端點連接到三次方曲線開始點。If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

Public Sub AddBeziers (ParamArray points As Point())
public: void AddBeziers(... cli::array <System::Drawing::Point> ^ points);

param.name: points
param.span: 結構的陣列，表示定義曲線的點。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curves.

summary.span: 將連接的三次方貝茲曲線序列加入至目前的圖形。

span.span: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points`參數指定的連接曲線控制點和端點的陣列。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 曲線的第一個從第一個點建構中的第四個點`points`陣列使用的第二個和第三個點做為控制點。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 除了先前曲線的結束點，每個後續的曲線順序中必須正好是三個的多個點： 序列中的下面兩個點是控點，以及第三個加入的曲線的端點。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，一條線被加入先前線段的端點連接到序列中的第一個三次方曲線開始點。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立陣列的七個點 （代表兩個連接的貝茲曲線）。Creates an array of seven points (representing two connected Bézier curves). - 建立路徑，並將系列的貝茲曲線的點加入路徑。Creates a path and adds the series of Bézier curve points to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points`參數指定的連接曲線控制點和端點的陣列。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 曲線的第一個從第一個點建構中的第四個點`points`陣列使用的第二個和第三個點做為控制點。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 除了先前曲線的結束點，每個後續的曲線順序中必須正好是三個的多個點： 序列中的下面兩個點是控點，以及第三個加入的曲線的端點。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果先前的線條或曲線圖中的，一條線被加入先前線段的端點連接到序列中的第一個三次方曲線開始點。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 如範例，請參閱：For an example see:

summary.span: 將關閉曲線加入這個路徑。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 主要曲線會被使用，因為該曲線會經過陣列中的每一個點。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddClosedCurve (System.Drawing.Point[] points);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddClosedCurve(valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] points) cil managed
Public Sub AddClosedCurve (points As Point())
public: void AddClosedCurve(cli::array <System::Drawing::Point> ^ points);

param.name: points
param.span: 結構的陣列，表示定義曲線的點。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curve.

summary.span: 將關閉曲線加入這個路徑。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 主要曲線會被使用，因為該曲線會經過陣列中的每一個點。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一個點並將最後一個點`points`陣列不是相同的點，會關閉連接這些點之兩個曲線。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. 張力值無法設定，此方法，並預設為相當於 0.5 的值。The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5. ## Examples 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see .

Public Sub AddClosedCurve (points As Point(), tension As Single)
public: void AddClosedCurve(cli::array <System::Drawing::Point> ^ points, float tension);

param.name: points
param.span: 結構的陣列，表示定義曲線的點。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curve.

param.name: tension
param.span: 從 0 到 1 之間的值，這個值會指定曲線在各點之間彎曲的量，其中 0 表示最小的曲線 (最銳利的角)，而 1 表示最平滑的曲線。

span.span: A value between from 0 through 1 that specifies the amount that the curve bends between points, with 0 being the smallest curve (sharpest corner) and 1 being the smoothest curve.

summary.span: 將關閉曲線加入這個路徑。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 主要曲線會被使用，因為該曲線會經過陣列中的每一個點。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一個點並將最後一個點`points`陣列不是相同的點，會關閉連接這些點之兩個曲線。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立陣列的六個點 （表示基線曲線）。Creates an array of six points (representing a cardinal spline). - 建立路徑，並將封閉基線曲線的曲線加入至路徑 （來自端點的起始點）。Creates a path and adds the closed cardinal spline curves to the path (closed from the endpoint to the starting point). - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to screen. 請注意，不會使用 0.5 的張力。Notice that a tension of 0.5 is used. summary.span: 將曲線加入目前的圖形。

span.span: Adds a spline curve to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 曲線開始所指定之陣列中的點`offset`參數包含所指定的點 （區段） 的數目和`numberOfSegments`。The curve begins at the point in the array specified by the `offset` parameter and includes the number of points (segments) specified by `numberOfSegments`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立四個點 （表示基線曲線） 的陣列。Creates an array of four points (representing a cardinal spline). - 建立路徑，並使用的點陣列時，將曲線加入路徑。Creates a path and using the array of points, adds the curve to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to the screen. 請注意，雖然陣列含有四個點，只有三個區段，這是要呼叫的第三個引數中指定的數字。Notice that while the array holds four points, there are only three segments, which is the number specified in the third argument of the call to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的點`points`陣列指定多邊形的頂點。The points in the `points` array specify the vertices of a polygon. 如果陣列中的第一個點不是最後一個點相同，這兩個點被連接到結束此多邊形。If the first point in the array is not the same as the last point, those two points are connected to close the polygon. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立定義多邊形的點陣列。Creates an array of points that defines a polygon. - 建立路徑，並將多邊形加入路徑。Creates a path and adds the polygon to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to the screen. First, notice that the `fontStyle` argument is cast as an integer. 方法需要這項設定，因此有兩個或多個成員可以結合以建立所需的字型樣式 (在此情況下，和)。The method requires this so that two or more members can be combined to create the desired font style (in this case, and ). 其次，請注意，方法用而不是方法。Secondly, notice that the method is used rather than the method. 如果使用時，呈現實心文字，而如果是，文字會外框樣式。If is used, solid text is rendered, whereas if is used, the text will be an outline style. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 傳回限定這個 之界限的矩形。

span.span: Returns a rectangle that bounds this .

returns.span: ，表示限定這個 之界限的矩形。

span.span: A that represents a rectangle that bounds this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的週框矩形的大小會受到端點、 畫筆寬度和畫筆斜接角限制的類型，因此會產生已繫結路徑的"鬆散符合"。The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path. 大約的公式是： 初始的週框根據畫筆寬度膨脹，和此結果會乘以斜接角限制，加上一些其他的邊界，以允許端點。The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立圖形路徑。Creates a graphics path. - 加入至其中的橢圓形 （圓形），並將它繪製到螢幕。Adds an ellipse (circle) to it and draws it to the screen. - 擷取週框圓形呼叫和繪製至畫面的矩形。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the circle with a call to and draws the rectangle to the screen. - 建立第二個圖形路徑。Creates a second graphics path. - 加入圓形，並擴展寬度為 10 的路徑。Adds a circle and widens the path to a width of 10. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws the path to the screen. - 擷取第二個圓形的週框。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the second circle. - 繪製螢幕的周框。Draws the bounding rectangle to the screen. - 在對話方塊中顯示的矩形大小。Displays the rectangle size in a dialog box. 請注意，這個周框右邊較大 （以額外的線條寬度的帳戶）。Notice that the bounding rectangle on the right is larger (to account for the extra width of the line). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的位元組陣列屬性指定之路徑中的點類型以及資料點的旗標。The array of bytes returned by the property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path. 針對每個點，位元 0 到 2 則表示點的類型和 3 到 7 位元會保存一組指定的點屬性的旗標。For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point. 下表顯示可能的值和其意義。The following table shows possible values and their meanings. |值Value|意義Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |00|表示的點是圖形的開始。Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |11|表示點是一個兩個線條的端點。Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |33|表示點的三次方貝茲曲線的結束點或控制項點。Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x70x7|遮罩除了三個低序位位元，指出 point 類型的所有位元。Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x200x20|指定的點是一個標記。Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x800x80|指定該點已關閉的子路徑 （圖） 中的最後一個點。Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑。Creates a path. - 將數個基本項目加入至它。Adds several primitives to it. - 繪製路徑的點陣列至畫面。Draws the path's points array to the screen. - 路徑重設為空白的狀態。Resets the path to an empty state. - （如果有的話），請重新擷取點陣列。Re-acquires the points array (if it exists). - 將陣列繪製到螢幕。Draws the array to the screen. 請注意，它會找到接在重設呼叫沒有任何陣列。Notice that it finds no array following the reset call. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來區隔的路徑區段的路徑上建立資料標記。This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path. 然後您可以使用方法來逐一查看在路徑中的標記。You can then use the methods to iterate through the markers in the path. 標記用來分隔子路徑的群組。Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths. 可包含一個或多個子路徑中的兩個資料標記之間。One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 程式碼建立路徑，並將數個基本項目加入至標記，以分隔的路徑並繪製到螢幕的路徑。The code creates a path and adds several primitives to the path separated by markers, and draws the path to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#26)]

summary.span: 不關閉目前的圖形而開始新圖形。

span.span: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.

summary.span: 所有後續加入至路徑的點會加入至這個新圖形。

span.span: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有需要使用者必須保留原始的點。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的點會在內部轉換成三次方貝茲控點，因此沒有任何機制傳回原始的點。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 這個方法會啟動新的子路徑的路徑中。This method starts a new subpath in the path. 路徑可讓您分隔成區段的路徑並使用來逐一查看子路徑的類別。Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the class to iterate through the subpaths. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑。Creates a path. - 將兩組數字。Adds two sets of figures. 第一組數字會將四個基本項目結合成兩個圖形。The first set of figures combines four primitives into two figures. 第二組數字結合了相同的四個基本項目 （不同之處在於它們會在 y 軸位移） 成三個圖形。The second set of figures combines the same four primitives (except that they are offset in the y-axis) into three figures. - 繪製到螢幕的所有數字。Draws all the figures to the screen. 請注意這兩組數字之間的外觀不同。Notice the difference in the appearance between the two sets of figures. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換可以調整、 翻譯、 旋轉或扭曲。The transformation can scale, translate, rotate, or skew the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑，並將橢圓形加入路徑。Creates a path and adds an ellipse to the path. - 繪製到螢幕的路徑。Draws path to the screen. - 建立轉換矩陣来轉譯路徑 100 單位 x 軸的方向。Creates a transform matrix to translate the path 100 units in the x-axis direction. - 繪製到螢幕的轉換的路徑。Draws the transformed path to the screen. 請注意，原始的橢圓形繪製成黑色，而且已轉換的橢圓形繪製成紅色。Notice that the original ellipse is drawn in black and the transformed ellipse is drawn in red. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會在此建立原始程式行外的框，與現有的行和新的外框之間的距離都相等的寬度的呼叫中使用。This method creates an outline around the original lines in this , with a distance between the existing lines and the new outline equal to that of the width of the used in the call to . 如果您想要填滿線條之間的空間必須使用而非。If you want to fill the space between the lines you must use the rather then the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`、事件物件。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立路徑，並將兩個橢圓形加入路徑。Creates a path and adds two ellipses to the path. - 繪製路徑以黑色。Draws the path in black. - 可擴展路徑。Widens the path. - 以紅色繪製路徑。Draws the path in red. 請注意，第二個轉譯使用而不是，因此轉譯的圖擁有填滿外框。Notice that the second rendering uses instead of , and hence the rendered figure has the outline filled.
